name: Butterfly Moment
description: Catch pretty little butterflies while admiring great views. Relax, unwind and let your rhythm guide you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 4-core CPU (including dual-core processors with hyperthreading) Minne: 4 GB RAM Grafik: Nvidia GTX1060 DirectX: Version 12 Lagring: 1 GB ledigt utrymme
